description: Michael Jackson was born on August 29, 1958, in Gary, Indiana. He began performing with his four brothers in the pop group the Jackson 5 during his childhood.
The Jackson family moved to Encino, California, in 1969 where Michael continued to rise to fame as part of the Jackson 5.
Michael Jackson lived most of his adult life in Los Angeles, California, where he pursued his solo career and became known as the 'King of Pop'.
